description.brief: Sensor calibration routines using OpenRAVE's planning features

package.description: Package uses openrave planning and the robot_calibration stacks to calibrate a robot's sensors. The calibration only depends on the openrave/collada descriptions, therefore it is meant to be a relatively simple way of calibrating new robots with one-click.
package.author: Rosen Diankov (rosen.diankov@gmail.com)
